tika-abh05t1:5_2: iminā vibhaṅgānantaraṁ dhātukathā desitāti tassā desanākālo apadiṭṭho hoti. Ye pana
tika-abh05t1:5_3: “vibhaṅgānantaraṁ kathāvatthupakaraṇaṁ desita”nti vadanti, tesaṁ vādaṁ paṭikkhipanto
tika-abh05t1:6_0: “Kāmā te paṭhamā senā”tiādivacanato kilesaviddhaṁsanampi devaputtamārassa balavidhamananti
tika-abh05t1:6_4: pahānābhisamayapariññābhisamayānaṁ vasena. Nanu cetaṁ pañcannaṁ mārānaṁ bhañjanaṁ
tika-abh05t1:6_5: sāvakesupi labbhatevāti codanaṁ manasi katvā āha “parūpanissayarahita”ntiādi. Vīrassa
tika-abh05t1:6_6: bhāvo vīriyanti katvā vuttaṁ “mahāvīriyoti mahāvīro”ti. Mahāvīriyatā ca paripuṇṇavīriyapāramitāya
tika-abh05t1:6_8: ca veditabbā. Tato eva hissa vīriyāhānisiddhipīti.
tika-abh05t1:7_0: Khandhādike dhamme adhiṭṭhāya nissāya visayaṁ katvā abhidhammakathā pavattāti āha
tika-abh05t1:7_1: “abhidhammakathādhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena vā”ti. Tesaṁ kathanatoti tesaṁ khandhādīnaṁ kathābhāvato.
tika-abh05t1:7_2: Etena atthavisesasannissayo byañjanasamudāyo pakaraṇanti vuttaṁ hoti. Atha vā dhātuyo
tika-abh05t1:7_3: kathīyanti ettha, etena vāti dhātukathā, tathāpavatto byañjanatthasamudāyo. Yadi
tika-abh05t1:7_4: evaṁ sattannampi pakaraṇānaṁ dhātukathābhāvo āpajjatīti codanaṁ sandhāyāha “yadipī”tiādi.
tika-abh05t1:7_5: Tattha sātisayanti savisesaṁ vicittātirekavasena anavasesato ca desanāya pavattattā.
tika-abh05t1:7_6: Tathā hi vuttaṁ “sabbāpi dhammasaṅgaṇī dhātukathāya mātikā”ti. Tenevāha “ekadesakathanameva
tika-abh05t1:8_0: Idāni sāsane yesu dhātu-saddo niruḷho, tesaṁ vasena aññehipi asādhāraṇaṁ imassa pakaraṇassa
tika-abh05t1:8_1: dhātukathābhāvaṁ dassento “khandhāyatanadhātūhi vā”tiādimāha. Tattha tatthāti khandhāyatanadhātūsu.
tika-abh05t1:8_2: Mahanto pabhedānugato visayo etāsanti mahāvisayā, dhātuyo, na khandhāyatanāni appatarapadattā.
tika-abh05t1:8_3: Yena vā sabhāvena dhammā saṅgahāsaṅgahasampayogavippayogehi uddesaniddese labhanti,
tika-abh05t1:8_4: so sabhāvo dhātu. Sā dhātu idha sātisayaṁ desitāti savisesaṁ dhātuyā kathanato idaṁ
tika-abh05t1:8_5: pakaraṇaṁ “dhātukathā”ti vuttaṁ. Sabhāvattho hi ayaṁ dhātu-saddo “dhātuso, bhikkhave,
tika-abh05t1:8_6: sattā saṁsandantī”tiādīsu viya. Dhātubhedanti dhātuvibhāgaṁ. Pakaraṇanti vacanaseso.
tika-abh05t1:8_7: Kuto pakaraṇa-saddo labbhatīti āha “sattannaṁ pakaraṇānaṁ kamena vaṇṇanāya pavattattā”ti.
tika-abh05t1:8_8: Tena yojanaṁ katvāti tena pakaraṇa-saddena “dhātukathāva pakaraṇaṁ dhātukathāpakaraṇa”nti
tika-abh05t1:8_9: yojanaṁ katvā. Taṁ dīpananti taṁ dhātukathāpakaraṇassa atthadīpanaṁ, atthadīpanākārena
tika-abh05t1:8_10: pavattaṁ vaṇṇanaṁ. “Atthaṁ dīpayissāmī”ti vatvā “taṁ suṇāthā”ti vadanto sotadvārānusārena
tika-abh05t1:8_11: tattha upadhāraṇe niyojetīti āha “taṁdīpanavacanasavanena upadhārethāti attho”ti.
tika-abh05t1:12_0: 1.Cuddasavidhenāti cuddasappakārena, cuddasahi padehīti attho. Tattha “saṅgaho asaṅgaho”ti
tika-abh05t1:12_1: idamekaṁ padaṁ, tathā “sampayogo vippayogo”ti. “Saṅgahitena sampayuttaṁ vippayutta”ntiādīni
tika-abh05t1:12_2: pana tīṇi tīṇi padāni ekekaṁ padaṁ. Itaresu padavibhāgo suviññeyyova. Etehīti saṅgahādippakārehi.
tika-abh05t1:12_3: Nayanaṁ pāpanaṁ, taṁ pana pavattanaṁ ñāpanañca hotīti “pavattīyati ñāyantī”ti ca
tika-abh05t1:12_4: dvidhāpi attho vutto. Nayā eva uddisiyamānā mātikā. Atthadvayepi pavattanañāṇakiriyānaṁ
tika-abh05t1:12_5: karaṇabhāvena saṅgahādippakārā nayāti vuttā. Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṁ “iminā saṅgahādikena
tika-abh05t1:12_6: nayenā”ti. Padānanti atthadīpakānaṁ vacanānaṁ. Pajjati etena atthoti hi padaṁ. Padānanti
tika-abh05t1:12_7: ca saṁsāmisambandhe sāmivacanaṁ, pakaraṇassāti pana avayavāvayavīsambandhe.
tika-abh05t1:14_1: hi paṭiccasamuppādo, paccekaṁ avijjādiko paccayadhammo. Tathā hi vuttaṁ saṅkhārapiṭake
tika-abh05t1:14_2: “dvādasa paccayā, dvādasa paṭiccasamuppādā”ti. Tesanti khandhādīnaṁ. Tathādassitānanti
tika-abh05t1:14_3: gaṇanuddesavibhāgamattena dassitānaṁ. Kasmā panettha paṭiccasamuppādo dvādasabhāveneva
tika-abh05t1:14_4: gahito, nanu tattha bhavo kammabhavādibhedena, sokādayo ca sarūpatoyeva idha pāḷiyaṁ
tika-abh05t1:14_5: gahitāti codanaṁ sandhāyāha “tatthā”tiādi. Tattha tatthāti tasmiṁ “pañcavīsādhikena
tika-abh05t1:14_6: padasatenā”ti evaṁ vutte aṭṭhakathāvacane. Kammabhavassa bhāvanabhāvena, upapattibhavassa
tika-abh05t1:14_7: bhavanabhāvena. Padatthato pana kammabhavo bhavati etasmāti bhavo, itaro bhavati,
tika-abh05t1:15_0: “Sabbāpi dhammasaṅgaṇī dhātukathāya mātikā”ti idampi dhātukathāya mātikākittanamevāti
tika-abh05t1:15_1: “sabbāpi…pe… mātikāti ayaṁ dhātukathāmātikāto bahiddhā vuttā”ti vacanaṁ asambhāvento
tika-abh05t1:15_2: “atha vā”tiādimāha. Pakaraṇantaragatā vuttā dhātukathāya mātikābhāvenāti attho. Kāmañcettha
tika-abh05t1:15_3: mātikābhāvena vuttā, pakaraṇantaragatattā pana aññato gahetabbarūpā ito bahibhūtā
tika-abh05t1:15_4: nāma honti, sarūpato gahitāva pañcakkhandhātiādikā abbhantarā. Tenāha “sarūpato dassetvā
tika-abh05t1:15_5: ṭhapitattā”ti. Mātikāya asaṅgahitattāti mātikāya sarūpena asaṅgahitattā, na aññathā.
tika-abh05t1:15_6: Na hi mātikāya asaṅgahito koci padattho atthi. Vikiṇṇabhāvenāti khandhavibhaṅgādīsu
tika-abh05t1:17_0: 3.Nayānaṁ saṅgahādippakāravisesānaṁ pavatti desanā, tassā viniggamaṭṭhānatāya dvāraṁ.
tika-abh05t1:17_1: Yathāvuttadhammā yathārahaṁ khandhāyatanadhātuyo arūpino ca khandhāti tesaṁ uddeso
tika-abh05t1:17_2: nayamukhamātikā. Tenāha “nayāna”ntiādi. Viyujjanasīlā, viyogo vā etesaṁ atthīti viyogino,
tika-abh05t1:17_3: tathā sahayogino, saṅgahāsaṅgahadhammā ca viyogīsahayogīdhammā ca saṅgahā…pe… dhammā,
tika-abh05t1:17_5: Cuddasapītiādinā tamevatthaṁ pākaṭataraṁ karoti. Yehīti yehi khandhādīhi arūpakkhandhehi
tika-abh05t1:17_6: ca. Te cattāroti te saṅgahādayo cattāro. Saccādīhipīti saccaindriyapaṭiccasamuppādādīhipi
tika-abh05t1:17_7: saha. Yathāsambhavanti sambhavānurūpaṁ, yaṁ yaṁ padaṁ saṅgahito asaṅgahitoti ca vattuṁ
tika-abh05t1:18_0: So panāti saṅgahāsaṅgaho. Saṅgāhakabhūtehīti saṅgahaṇakiriyāya kattubhūtehi. Tehīti
tika-abh05t1:18_1: saccādīhi. Na saṅgahabhūtehīti saṅgahaṇakiriyāya karaṇabhūtehi saccādīhi saṅgahāsaṅgaho
tika-abh05t1:18_2: na vutto. Tatthāpi hi khandhāyatanadhātuyo eva karaṇabhūtāti dasseti. Khandhādīheva
tika-abh05t1:18_4: āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, te dhammā catūhi khandhehi,
tika-abh05t1:18_5: dvīhāyatanehi, aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā”ti saṅgahāsaṅgaho niyametvā vutto. Tasmāti
tika-abh05t1:18_6: yasmā saccādīni saṅgāhakabhāvena vuttāni, na saṅgahabhāvena, khandhādīniyeva ca saṅgahabhāvena vuttāni, tasmā.
tika-abh05t1:19_0: Kasmā panettha saccādayo saṅgahavasena na vuttāti? Tathādesanāya asambhavato. Na
tika-abh05t1:19_1: hi sakkā rūpakkhandhādīnaṁ samudayasaccādīhi, saññādīnaṁ vā indriyādīhi saṅgahanayena
tika-abh05t1:19_2: pucchituṁ vissajjituṁ vāti. Tathā ariyaphalādīsu uppannavedanādīnaṁ saccavinimuttatāya
tika-abh05t1:19_3: “vedanākkhandho katihi saccehi saṅgahito”ti pucchitvāpi “ekena saccena saṅgahito”tiādinā
tika-abh05t1:19_4: niyametvā saṅgahaṁ dassetuṁ na sakkāti. Yathāsambhavanti yehi sampayogo, yehi ca
tika-abh05t1:20_0: Rūpaṁ rūpena nibbānena vā vippayuttaṁ na hoti, nibbānaṁ vā rūpena. Kasmā? Sampayuttanti
tika-abh05t1:20_2: so atthi natthī”ti siyā āsaṅkā, tasmā tesaṁ itarehi, itaresañca tehi vippayogo vuccati,
tika-abh05t1:20_3: na pana rūpassa rūpena, nibbānena vā, nibbānassa vā rūpena katthaci sampayogo atthīti
tika-abh05t1:20_4: tadāsaṅkābhāvato vippayogopi rūpassa rūpanibbānehi, nibbānassa vā tena na vuccati,
tika-abh05t1:20_5: arūpakkhandhehiyeva pana vuccatīti āha “catūhevā”tiādi. Anārammaṇassa cakkhāyatanādikassa.
tika-abh05t1:20_8: hotīti yojetabbaṁ. Yesaṁ pana yehi hoti, taṁ dassetuṁ “anārammaṇassa panā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:20_9: Yathā hi sārammaṇassa anārammaṇena anārammaṇamissakena ca vippayogo hoti, evaṁ sārammaṇenapi
tika-abh05t1:20_10: so hotiyeva. Tena viya anārammaṇassa anārammaṇamissakassa cāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:22_0: 4.Visuṁ yojanā kātabbāti yo tīhi saṅgaho catūhi ca sampayogo vutto, taṁ sabhāgo bhāvo
tika-abh05t1:22_1: payojeti, yo ca tīhi asaṅgaho catūhi ca vippayogo vutto, taṁ visabhāgo bhāvoti imamatthaṁ
tika-abh05t1:22_2: dassento “saṅgaho…pe… viññāyatī”ti āha. Yassa saṅgaho, so dhammo khandhādiko sabhāgo.
tika-abh05t1:22_3: Yassa asaṅgaho, so visabhāgo. Tathā sampayogesupi veditabbaṁ. Idāni yathāvuttaṁ sabhāgataṁ
tika-abh05t1:22_4: sarūpato niddhāretvā dassetuṁ “tatthā”tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha samānabhāvo saṅgahe sabhāgatā,
tika-abh05t1:22_5: ekuppādādiko sampayogeti iminā ruppanādividhuro asamānasabhāvo asaṅgahe visabhāgatā,
tika-abh05t1:22_6: nānuppādādiko vippayogeti ayamattho atthasiddhoti na vuttoti.
tika-abh05t1:24_0: 5.Etena ṭhapanākārenāti sarūpena aggahetvā yathāvuttena pakaraṇantaramātikāya idha
tika-abh05t1:24_2: pacchato gahaṇaṁ bahi ṭhapananti āha “bahi piṭṭhito ṭhapitattā”ti. Idha aṭṭhapetvāti
tika-abh05t1:24_3: imissā dhātukathāya sarūpena avatvā. Tathā pakāsitattāti mātikābhāvena jotitattā.
tika-abh05t1:24_4: Dhammasaṅgaṇīsīsena hi dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṁ āgatamātikāva gahitāti. Yehi nayehi dhātukathāya
tika-abh05t1:24_5: niddeso, tesu nayesu, tehi vibhajitabbesu khandhādīsu, tesaṁ nayānaṁ pavattidvāralakkhaṇesu
tika-abh05t1:24_6: ca uddiṭṭhesu dhātukathāya uddesavasena vattabbaṁ vuttameva hotīti yaṁ uddesavasena
tika-abh05t1:24_7: vattabbaṁ, taṁ vatvā puna yathāvuttānaṁ khandhādīnaṁ kusalādivibhāgadassanatthaṁ
tika-abh05t1:24_8: “sabbāpi dhammasaṅgaṇī dhātukathāya mātikā”ti vuttanti evamettha mātikāya nikkhepavidhi veditabbo.
tika-abh05t1:25_0: “Gāvīti ayamāhā”ti ettha gāvī-saddo viya “saṅgaho asaṅgaho”ti ettha padatthavipallāsakārinā
tika-abh05t1:25_1: iti-saddena atthapadatthako saṅgahāsaṅgaha-saddo saddapadatthako jāyatīti adhippāyenāha
tika-abh05t1:25_2: “aniddhāritatthassa saddasseva vuttattā”ti. Tena atthuddhārato saṅgahasaddaṁ saṁvaṇṇetīti
tika-abh05t1:25_4: saṅgahasaddābhidheyyatāsāmaññena viññāyamāno vuccamāno vā. Na cettha sāmaññañca ekarūpamevāti
tika-abh05t1:25_5: codanā kātabbā bhedāpekkhattā tassa. Yattakā hi tassa visesā, tadapekkhameva tanti.
tika-abh05t1:25_6: “Attano jātiyā”ti viññāyati yathā “matteyyā”ti vutte attano mātu hitāti.
tika-abh05t1:26_1: akatvā. Sāmaññenāti avisesena. Dhammānanti khandhādidhammānaṁ. Avasesā niddhāretvāti
tika-abh05t1:26_3: niddhāretvā dhammānaṁ pucchanavissajjananayauddesāti yojanā. Nanu ca “saṅgahitena
tika-abh05t1:26_4: asaṅgahita”ntiādayopi yathāvuttavisesaṁ aniddhāretvā sāmaññena dhammānaṁ pucchanavissajjananayuddesāti
tika-abh05t1:26_5: codanaṁ sandhāyāha “saṅgahitena asaṅgahita”ntiādi. Yassa attho ñāyati, saddo ca na
tika-abh05t1:26_6: payujjati, so lopoti veditabbo, āvuttiādivasena vā ayamattho dīpetabbo. Tenāti luttaniddiṭṭhena
tika-abh05t1:26_8: tena sotāyatanādibhāvena asaṅgahito sotapasādādiko yo ruppanasabhāvo dhammaviseso.
tika-abh05t1:26_9: Tannissito taṁ dhammavisesaṁ nissāya labbhamāno. “Te dhammā katihi khandhehi…pe…
tika-abh05t1:26_10: catūhi khandhehi asaṅgahitā”tiādinā asaṅgahitatāsaṅkhāto pucchāvissajjananayo parato
tika-abh05t1:26_11: pucchitvā vissajjiyamāno idha uddiṭṭho hoti. Visesane karaṇavacananti iminā tassa
tika-abh05t1:27_0: Nanu ca “saṅgahitena asaṅgahita”nti ettāvatāpi ayamattho labbhatīti? Na labbhati
tika-abh05t1:27_1: tassa dhammamattadīpanato. Nayuddeso heso, na dhammuddeso. Tathā hi pāḷiyaṁ saṅgahitenaasaṅgahitapadaniddese
tika-abh05t1:27_2: “cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā, āyatana…pe… dhātusaṅgahena
tika-abh05t1:27_3: asaṅgahitā”ti vatvā “te dhammā katihi khandhehi…pe… asaṅgahitā”ti pucchitvā “te dhammā
tika-abh05t1:27_4: catūhi khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi aṭṭhahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā”ti dutiyaṁ asaṅgahitapadaṁ
tika-abh05t1:27_5: gahitaṁ. Aññathā “cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā, te dhammā
tika-abh05t1:27_6: āyatanasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, dhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā. Te katame”icceva niddisitabbaṁ siyā.
tika-abh05t1:28_0: Esa nayoti atidesena dassitamatthaṁ pākaṭataraṁ kātuṁ “tesupī”tiādi vuttaṁ. Tatiyapadenāti
tika-abh05t1:28_1: luttaniddesena gahetabbanti vuttapadaṁ sandhāyāha. Kattuatthe karaṇaniddeso saṅgahitāsaṅgahitehi
tika-abh05t1:28_2: tehi dhammehi dhammānaṁ saṅgahitatāsaṅgahitatāya vuttattā. Tathā hi tattha pāḷiyaṁ
tika-abh05t1:28_3: “tehi dhammehi ye dhammā”ti dhammamukheneva saṅgahitatāsaṅgahitatā vuttā. Dutiyatatiyesu
tika-abh05t1:28_5: vuttāti tattha “visesane karaṇavacana”nti vuttaṁ. Tenāha “tattha hi…pe… dhammantarassā”ti.
tika-abh05t1:28_8: Dhammantarenāti aññadhammena. Dhammantarassāti tato aññassa dhammassa visesanaṁ kataṁ.
tika-abh05t1:28_9: Tattha hi antarena pakāravisesāmasanaṁ dhammeneva dhammo visesitoti. Ādipadenevāti
tika-abh05t1:28_11: vuttehi dutiyatatiyapadehi. Etthāti ekādasamādīsu catūsu. Dutiyatatiyesu viya visesane
tika-abh05t1:28_12: eva karaṇavacanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ, na catutthapañcamesu viya kattuattheti adhippāyo. Pucchāvissajjanānantiādinā
tika-abh05t1:29_0: Vividhakappanatoti vividhaṁ bahudhā kappanato, saṅgahāsaṅgahānaṁ visuṁ saha ca visesanavisesitabbabhāvakappanatoti
tika-abh05t1:29_1: attho. Taṁ pana vikappanaṁ vuttākārena vibhajanaṁ hotīti āha “vibhāgatoti attho”ti.
tika-abh05t1:29_2: Sanniṭṭhānalakkhaṇena adhimokkhena sampayuttadhammā ārammaṇe nicchayanākārena pavattiyā
tika-abh05t1:29_3: sanniṭṭhānavasena vuttadhammā. Te ca tehi saddhiṁ tadavasiṭṭhe dvipañcaviññāṇavicikicchāsahagatadhamme
tika-abh05t1:29_4: ca saṅgahetvā āha “sanniṭṭhānavasena vuttā ca sabbe ca cittuppādā sanniṭṭhānavasena
tika-abh05t1:29_5: vuttasabbacittuppādā”ti. Itareti phassādayo. Sabbesanti ekūnanavutiyā cittuppādānaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:29_6: Pariggahetabbāti saṅgahādivasena pariggaṇhitabbā. Mahāvisayena adhimokkhena. Aññesanti
tika-abh05t1:29_7: vitakkādīnaṁ. Vacanaṁ sandhāyāti “adhimuccanaṁ adhimokkho, so sanniṭṭhānalakkhaṇo”ti
tika-abh05t1:29_9: ca āgataṁ vacanaṁ sandhāya. Atthe satīti “sanniṭṭhāna…pe… sādhāraṇato”ti evamatthe
tika-abh05t1:29_10: vuccamāne. Vattabbesūti saṅgahādipariggahatthaṁ vattabbesu. Vuttā phassādayo manasikārapariyosānā.
tika-abh05t1:29_11: Tādisassāti phassādisadisassa sādhāraṇassa adhimokkhasadisassa asādhāraṇassa aññassa dhammassa abhāvā.
tika-abh05t1:30_0: Nanu jīvitindriyacittaṭṭhitiyopi sādhāraṇāti? Saccaṁ sādhāraṇā, atthi pana visesoti
tika-abh05t1:30_1: dassento āha “jīvitindriyaṁ panā”tiādi. Asamādhisabhāvā balabhāvaṁ appattā sāmaññasaddeneva
tika-abh05t1:30_2: vattabbāti yojanā. Sāmaññavisesasaddehi cāti sāmaññavisesasaddehi vattabbā ca samādhisabhāvā
tika-abh05t1:30_3: cittekaggatā. Visesasaddavacanīyaṁ aññanti balappattasamādhito aññaṁ sāmaññasaddena
tika-abh05t1:30_4: byāpetabbaṁ, visesasaddena ca nivattetabbaṁ natthi samādhisabhāvāya eva cittekaggatāya
tika-abh05t1:30_5: gahitattā. Na aññabyāpakanivattako sāmaññaviseso anañña…pe… viseso, tassa dīpanato.
tika-abh05t1:30_6: Tasseva dhammassāti tasseva balappattasamādhidhammassa. Bhedadīpakehīti visesadīpakehi
tika-abh05t1:30_8: saddā. Tato viparītehi aññaṁ byāpetabbaṁ nivattetabbañca gahetvā pavattehi sāmaññavisesasaddeheva
tika-abh05t1:30_9: na sukhādisabhāvā vedanā viya vattabbā. Tasmāti yasmā asamādhisabhāvā samādhisabhāvāti
tika-abh05t1:30_10: dvedhā bhinditvā gahitā cittekaggatā, tasmā. Asamādhisabhāvameva pakāseyya visesasaddanirapekkhaṁ
tika-abh05t1:30_11: pavattamānattā. Itaroti samādhibalādiko visesasaddo. Idhāti imasmiṁ abbhantaramātikuddese,
tika-abh05t1:30_12: sādhāraṇe phassādike, mahāvisaye vā adhimokkhe uddisiyamāne. Nanu ca abhinditvā gayhamānā
tika-abh05t1:30_13: cittekaggatā vedanā viya sādhāraṇā hotīti codanaṁ sandhāyāha “abhinnāpi vā”tiādi.
tika-abh05t1:30_14: “Cittassa ṭhiti cittekaggatā avisāhaṭamānasatā. Arūpīnaṁ dhammānaṁ āyu ṭhitī”ti vacanato
tika-abh05t1:30_15: samādhijīvitindriyānaṁ aññadhammanissayena vattabbatā veditabbā. Na arahatīti idha
tika-abh05t1:30_16: uddesaṁ na arahati samukheneva vattabbesu phassādīsu uddisiyamānesūti attho.
tika-abh05t1:35_1: ca abhiññātalakkhaṇavisayāti āha “sabhāvato abhiññātāna”nti. Pariññeyyatādīti ādi-saddena
tika-abh05t1:35_3: Saccādiviseso viyāti dukkhasaccādipariyāyo abhiññeyyapīḷanaṭṭhādiviseso viya. Evañca
tika-abh05t1:35_4: katvāti nayamukhamātikāya abhiññeyyanissayena vuccamānattā eva. Tesaṁ rūpadhammānaṁ
tika-abh05t1:35_5: pañcannaṁ khandhānaṁ khandhabhāvena viya rūpakkhandhabhāvena sabhāgatā hoti, na vedanākkhandhādibhāvenāti
tika-abh05t1:35_6: saṅgahalakkhaṇamāha. Itīti tasmā, yasmā rūpadhammā aññamaññaṁ rūpakkhandhabhāvena
tika-abh05t1:35_7: sabhāgā, tasmāti attho. Rūpakkhandhabhāvasaṅkhātena rūpakkhandhabhāvena atthamukheneva
tika-abh05t1:35_8: gahaṇe. Saddadvārena pana gahaṇe rūpakkhandhavacanasaṅkhātena vā rūpakkhandhavacanavacanīyatāsaṅkhātena.
tika-abh05t1:35_9: Idāni tamevatthaṁ pākaṭataraṁ kātuṁ “rūpakkhandhoti hī”tiādi vuttaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:36_1: ānetvā yathārahaṁ yojetabbaṁ. Abhedato pañcakapucchāvissajjanaṁ khandhapadaniddese
tika-abh05t1:38_1: ekena khandhena…pe… maggasaccaṁ ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṁ,
tika-abh05t1:38_2: catūhi khandhehi ekādasahi āyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahita”nti niddiṭṭhattā.
tika-abh05t1:38_5: ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitaṁ, catūhi khandhehi ekādasahi āyatanehi sattarasahi
tika-abh05t1:38_6: dhātūhi asaṅgahita”nti ekake sadisaṁ vissajjanaṁ. Cakkhusotindriyadukassa pana “cakkhundriyañca
tika-abh05t1:38_7: sotindriyañca ekena khandhena dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā, catūhi khandhehi
tika-abh05t1:38_8: dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā”ti, “cakkhundriyañca sukhindriyañca dvīhi
tika-abh05t1:38_9: khandhehi dvīhāyatanehi dvīhi dhātūhi saṅgahitā, tīhi khandhehi dasahāyatanehi soḷasahi
tika-abh05t1:38_10: dhātūhi asaṅgahitā”ti cakkhusukhindriyadukassa ca asadisaṁ vissajjanaṁ. Nāpi dukehi
tika-abh05t1:38_12: sadisaṁ vissajjanaṁ. Idhāti saccapadaniddese. Tikena cāti dukkhasamudayamaggāditikena
tika-abh05t1:38_13: ca. “Pañcahi khandhehi dvādasahāyatanehi aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā, na kehici
tika-abh05t1:38_14: khandhehi na kehici āyatanehi na kāhici dhātūhi asaṅgahitā”ti sadisaṁ vissajjanaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:40_1: kattabbaṁ, “sabbampi viññāṇa”nti vattabbanti adhippāyo. Tattha kāraṇamāha “kusalādīnampī”tiādinā.
tika-abh05t1:40_2: Vissajjanāsadisena sabbaviññāṇādisaṅgahaṇato. Tesanti viññāṇādipadānaṁ. Idhāti imasmiṁ
tika-abh05t1:40_3: paṭhamanaye. Akammajānampi saṅgahitatā viññāyati saddāyatanassapi gahitattā.
tika-abh05t1:41_4: Tato “rūpakkhandhassa sabhāgāni, arūpānaṁ pana jātijarāmaraṇānī”ti ānetvā yojanā.
tika-abh05t1:41_5: Ekekabhūtānīti yathā ekasmiṁ rūpakalāpe jātiādīni ekekāniyeva honti, evaṁ ekasmiṁ
tika-abh05t1:41_7: vedanādīnaṁ nibbattiādibhūtānipi jātiādīni tathā na gayhantīti āha “vediyana…pe…
tika-abh05t1:41_8: agayhamānānī”ti. Tena vedanākkhandhādīhi jātiādīnaṁ saṅgahābhāvamāha. “Jāti, bhikkhave,
tika-abh05t1:41_9: aniccā saṅkhatā”tiādivacanato jātiādīnampi saṅkhatapariyāyo atthīti saṅkhatābhisaṅkharaṇakiccena
tika-abh05t1:41_10: saṅkhārakkhandhena tesaṁ saṅgahoti vuttaṁ “saṅkhatā…pe… sabhāgānī”ti. Teneva ca saṅkhārakkhandhassa
tika-abh05t1:41_11: anekantaparamatthakiccatā veditabbā. Tathā duvidhānīti vuttappakārena rūpārūpadhammānaṁ
tika-abh05t1:41_12: nibbattiādibhāvena dvippakārāni. Tenāti yathāvuttasabhāgatthena. Tehi khandhādīhīti
tika-abh05t1:44_1: gahetabbā visesanavisesitabbatāya icchitattā. Yo hi dhammo saṅgahitatāvisesavisiṭṭho
tika-abh05t1:44_2: asaṅgahito heṭṭhā uddiṭṭho, sveva idha asaṅgahitabhāvena pucchitvā vissajjīyatīti
tika-abh05t1:44_3: dassento “yaṁ taṁ…pe… tadeva dassento”ti āha. Ye hi dhammā cakkhāyatanena khandhasaṅgahena
tika-abh05t1:44_4: saṅgahitā, āyatanadhātusaṅgahena ca asaṅgahitā, tesaṁyeva puna khandhādīhi asaṅgaho
tika-abh05t1:44_5: pucchitvā vissajjito. Tena vuttaṁ “cakkhāyatanena…pe… āhā”ti. Sabbatthāti sabbesu
tika-abh05t1:44_7: vuttānaṁ khandhādisaṅgahānaṁ. “Sāmaññajotanā visese avatiṭṭhatī”ti āha “niccaṁ visesāpekkhattā”ti.
tika-abh05t1:44_10: savisesāva khandhādigaṇanā, khandhādinā saṅgahoti attho. Suddhāti kevalā anavasesā,
tika-abh05t1:45_0: Tatthāti yathādhikate dutiyanaye. Sāmaññajotanāya visesaniddiṭṭhattā āha “saṅgahi…pe…
tika-abh05t1:45_1: niddhāritattā”ti. Tīsu saṅgahesūti khandhādisaṅgahesu tīsu. Aññehīti vuttāvasesehi
tika-abh05t1:45_2: dvīhi ekena vā. Ettakeneva dassetabbā siyuṁ tāvatāpi saṅgahitena asaṅgahitabhāvassa
tika-abh05t1:45_5: niddisituṁ asambhavā. Saṅgahādinayadassanamattaṁ nayamātikāya byāpāro, yattha pana
tika-abh05t1:45_6: saṅgahādayo, te khandhādayo kusalādayo ca tesaṁ visayabhūtāti tehi vinā saṅgahādīnaṁ
tika-abh05t1:45_8: asaṅgāhakañcāti vattabbaṁ. Yo hi idha saṅgāhakabhāvena vutto dhammo asaṅgāhakabhāvenapi vuttoyevāti.
tika-abh05t1:46_0: “Ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā, āyatanadhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā”ti, “ye dhammā
tika-abh05t1:46_1: khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā”ti ca yattha pucchitabbavissajjitabbadhammavisesaniddhāraṇaṁ
tika-abh05t1:46_2: natthi, tattha paṭhamanaye chaṭṭhanaye ca “rūpakkhandho katihi khandhehi saṅgahito?
tika-abh05t1:46_3: Ekena khandhenā”ti, “rūpakkhandho katihi khandhehi sampayuttoti? Natthi. Catūhi khandhehi
tika-abh05t1:46_4: vippayutto”ti ca evaṁ pucchitabbavissajjitabbabhāvena. Itaresūti dutiyādinayesu.
tika-abh05t1:46_5: Tassa tassāti yaṁ pucchitabbaṁ vissajjitabbañca “ye dhammā”ti aniyamitarūpena niddhāritaṁ,
tika-abh05t1:47_0: Etthāti etasmiṁ pakaraṇe. Yena yena cakkhāyatanādinā saṅgāhakena. Khandhādisaṅgahesūti
tika-abh05t1:47_1: khandhāyatanadhātusaṅgahesu. Tena tenāti khandhādisaṅgahena. Aññanti tato tato saṅgāhakato
tika-abh05t1:47_2: aññaṁ. Tabbinimuttaṁ saṅgahetabbāsaṅgahetabbaṁ yaṁ dhammajātaṁ atthi, taṁ tadeva
tika-abh05t1:47_3: “cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā, āyatanadhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā”ti
tika-abh05t1:47_4: saṅgāhakāsaṅgāhakabhāvena uddhaṭaṁ. Añño dhammo natthi tassa sabhāgabhāvena saṅgāhakasseva
tika-abh05t1:47_5: abhāvato. Siyā panetaṁ sabhāgena ekadesena saṅgahoti, taṁ paṭikkhipanto āha “na ca
tika-abh05t1:48_0: Yadicātiādināpi tasseva tena saṅgahābhāvaṁ pāṭhābhāvadassanena vibhāveti. Tattha
tika-abh05t1:48_1: so evāti yo rūpādikkhandho saṅgāhakabhāvena vutto, so eva tena rūpādikkhandhena saṅgayheyya
tika-abh05t1:48_2: saṅgahetabbo bhaveyya, teneva tassa saṅgahābhāve lakkhaṇaṁ dassento āha “na hi so
tika-abh05t1:48_3: eva tassa sabhāgo visabhāgo cā”ti. Ekadesā viya cakkhāyatanādayo samudāyassa rūpakkhandhādikassa.
tika-abh05t1:48_4: Rūpakkhandho cakkhāyatanādīnaṁ na saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako ca sabhāgavisabhāgabhāvābhāvato.
tika-abh05t1:48_5: Esa nayo sesesupi. Samudāyantogadhānantiādinā vuttamevatthaṁ pākaṭataraṁ karoti.
tika-abh05t1:48_6: Tattha yenāti vibhāgena. Teti ekadesā. Tesanti ekadesānaṁ. Ettha tadantogadhatāya
tika-abh05t1:49_0: Yathā sabbena sabbaṁ sabhāgavisabhāgābhāvena ekadesānaṁ samudāyo saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako
tika-abh05t1:49_1: ca na hoti, evaṁ ekadesasabhāgavisabhāgānanti dassento “tathā”tiādimāha. Tattha yathātiādi
tika-abh05t1:49_2: udāharaṇadassanena yathāvuttassa atthassa pākaṭakaraṇaṁ. Khandhasaṅgahena saṅgāhakaṁ
tika-abh05t1:49_3: asaṅgāhakañcāti yojanā. Tathā sesesupi. Na hi ekadesa…pe… visabhāgaṁ yena samudāyo
tika-abh05t1:49_4: saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako ca siyāti adhippāyo. Ettha ca saṅgāhakattaṁ tāva mā hotu, asaṅgāhakattaṁ
tika-abh05t1:49_5: pana kasmā paṭikkhipīyatīti codanaṁ manasi katvā āha “tasmā”tiādi. Tattha tasmāti
tika-abh05t1:49_6: vuttamevatthaṁ hetubhāvena parāmasati. Attato aññassa, attani antogadhato aññassa,
tika-abh05t1:49_7: attekadesasabhāgato aññassa satipi asaṅgāhakatteti yojanā. Taṁ panetaṁ “rūpakkhandho
tika-abh05t1:49_8: rūpakkhandhena saṅgahito asaṅgahito ca na hotī”tiādinā vutte tayo pakāre sandhāya
tika-abh05t1:49_9: vuttaṁ. Saṅgāhakattameva etesaṁ natthīti etesaṁ attā, attani antogadho, attekadesasabhāgo
tika-abh05t1:49_10: cāti vuttānaṁ saṅgāhakabhāvo eva natthi sabhāgābhāvato. Tena vuttaṁ “na hi so eva
tika-abh05t1:49_11: tassa sabhāgo”tiādi. Yenāti saṅgāhakattena. Evarūpānanti yathāvuttānaṁ tippakārānaṁ
tika-abh05t1:50_1: dhammāyatanassa saṅgāhakattaṁ ekadesena samudāyassa saṅgahitabhāvanti attho, samudāyassa
tika-abh05t1:50_2: rūpakkhandhassa ekadesassa cakkhāyatanassa sotāyatanassa ca saṅgāhakattaṁ samudāyena
tika-abh05t1:50_3: ekadesassa saṅgahitabhāvanti vuttaṁ hoti. Yadi evaṁ na dasseti, atha kiṁ dassetīti
tika-abh05t1:50_7: karaṇavacanaṁ, na kattuattheti katvā āha “saṅgāhakāsaṅgāhakanirapekkhāna”nti. Tenevāha
tika-abh05t1:50_9: Nanu ca dutiyādīsu gaṇanādīnipi vijjantīti? Saccaṁ vijjanti, tāni pana visesanabhūtāni
tika-abh05t1:50_10: appadhānānīti visesitabbabhūtānaṁ padhānānaṁ vasenevaṁ vuttaṁ. “Cakkhāyatanena ye
tika-abh05t1:50_11: dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā”tiādinā kattuādayo niddiṭṭhāti āha “kattukaraṇakammattayasabbhāvā”ti.
tika-abh05t1:51_0: Tathā tathāti tena tena rūpakkhandhādippakārena. Taṁtaṁkhandhādibhāvābhāvo sabhāgavisabhāgatāti
tika-abh05t1:51_2: attho. Yathāniddhāritadhammadassaneti “ye dhammā, te dhammā”ti niddhāritappakāradhammanirūpane.
tika-abh05t1:51_5: attho. Tadabhāvoti tassa samānakkhandhādibhāvassa abhāvo aññakkhandhādibhāvo. Ayanti
tika-abh05t1:51_6: yvāyaṁ paṭhamanaye tathā tathā gaṇetabbāgaṇetabbatāsaṅkhāto dutiyādinayesu yathāvuttānaṁ
tika-abh05t1:52_1: saṅgahitatāvisiṭṭhassa asaṅgāhakattassa abhāvato. Na hi sakkā “samudayasaccena ye
tika-abh05t1:52_2: dhammā khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā, āyatanadhātusaṅgahena asaṅgahitā”tiādi vattuṁ.
tika-abh05t1:52_4: na uddhaṭānīti yojanā. Evantiādi yathāvuttassa atthassa nigamanavasena vuttaṁ. Na
tika-abh05t1:53_0: “Khandhapadenā”ti idaṁ karaṇatthe karaṇavacanaṁ, na kattuattheti āha “khandhapadasaṅgahenāti
tika-abh05t1:53_1: attho”ti. Tenevassa kattuatthataṁ paṭisedhetuṁ “na saṅgāhakenā”ti vuttaṁ. Karaṇaṁ
tika-abh05t1:53_2: pana katturahitaṁ natthīti āha “kenaci saṅgāhakenāti idaṁ pana ānetvā vattabba”nti.
tika-abh05t1:53_3: Saṅgāhakesu na yujjati na saṅgahetabbesūti adhippāyo. Rūpakkhandhadhammā hi “ye dhammā
tika-abh05t1:53_4: khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahitā”ti vuttāti. Samudāye vuttavidhi tadavayavepi sambhavatīti
tika-abh05t1:53_5: codanaṁ samuṭṭhāpento “etena nayenā”tiādimāha. Paṭiyogīnivattanaṁ eva-saddena karīyatīti
tika-abh05t1:53_6: āha “na hi aññamattanivāraṇaṁ eva-saddassa attho”ti. Tenāha “saṅgāhakato aññanivāraṇaṁ
tika-abh05t1:53_7: eva-saddassa attho”ti. So ca…pe… pekkhanti iminā tamevatthaṁ pākaṭataraṁ karoti.
tika-abh05t1:53_9: ettha cakkhāyatanaṁ saṅgāhakanti yathādhippetassa atthassa asambhavo evāti idāni
tika-abh05t1:54_1: āyatanadhātuvisesanatthaṁ. Na so eva tassa, samudāyo vā tadekadesānaṁ saṅgāhako asaṅgāhako
tika-abh05t1:54_2: ca hotīti vuttovāyamatthoti āha “rūpakkhandho…pe… na hotī”ti. Iminā pariyāyenāti
tika-abh05t1:54_3: yasmā vuttappakāraṁ saṅgāhakattaṁ natthi “yena saṅgahitassa asaṅgāhakaṁ siyā”ti iminā
tika-abh05t1:54_4: pariyāyena. Asaṅgahitatāya abhāvo vutto aṭṭhakathāyaṁ “so ca…pe… natthī”ti. Saṅgahitatāyāti
tika-abh05t1:54_5: nippariyāyena saṅgahitabhāvena asaṅgahitatāya abhāvo vuttoti na yujjatīti yojanā.
tika-abh05t1:54_6: Sā saṅgahitatāti attanā attano, attekadesānaṁ vā saṅgahitatā. Tenāti rūpakkhandhena.
tika-abh05t1:54_7: Tesanti rūpakkhandhatadekadesānaṁ. Atthi ca vippayuttatā vedanākkhandhādīhi. Cakkhāyatanādīhi
tika-abh05t1:54_8: viyāti visadisudāharaṇaṁ. Etehi rūpavedanākkhandhādīhi aññehi ca evarūpehi. Etāni
tika-abh05t1:55_0: Teneva tassa saṅgahitattābhāvadassanena heṭṭhā dassitena. Etthāti etasmiṁ vāre. Aggahaṇeti
tika-abh05t1:55_1: akathane, adesanāyanti attho. Samudayasaccādīsūti samudayasaccasukhindriyādīsu yujjeyya
tika-abh05t1:55_2: taṁ kāraṇaṁ. Kasmā? Tehi samudayasaccādīhi khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahite dhammajāte
tika-abh05t1:55_3: sati tassa āyatanasaṅgahādīhi asaṅgahitattassa abhāvato. Rūpakkhandhādīhīti rūpakkhandhavedanākkhandhādīhi.
tika-abh05t1:55_4: Saṅgahitameva natthi, kasmā? “So eva tassa saṅgāhako na hotī”ti vuttovāyamattho.
tika-abh05t1:55_5: Yadipi rūpakkhandhādinā rūpakkhandhādikassa attano…pe… natthīti sambandho. Aññassa
tika-abh05t1:55_6: pana vedanākkhandhādikassa rūpakkhandhādinā saṅgahitattābhāvena asaṅgahitattaṁ atthīti
tika-abh05t1:55_7: yojanā. Ubhayābhāvoti saṅgahitattāsaṅgahitattābhāvo. Ettha etasmiṁ vāre. Dhammāyatanajīvitindriyādīnanti
tika-abh05t1:55_9: yojanā. Pāḷiyaṁ anāgatattā “satī”ti sāsaṅkaṁ vadati. Ādi-saddena paṭhamena dhammadhātusaḷāyatanādīnaṁ
tika-abh05t1:55_10: sukhindriyādīnañca, dutiyena ekakkhandhassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Sukhindriyañhi vedanākkhandhasseva
tika-abh05t1:55_11: saṅgāhakaṁ. Tesanti khandhacatukkakhandhadukādīnaṁ asaṅgahitatā na natthi atthevāti
tika-abh05t1:55_12: tassā abhāvo anekantiko. Pubbe vuttanayenāti “rūpakkhandhādīhi panā”tiādinā vuttanayena.
tika-abh05t1:56_0: Tatthevāti tasmiṁyeva pubbe vutte sanidassanasappaṭighapade. Nivattetvā gaṇhantoti
tika-abh05t1:56_1: pubbe vuttaṁ paṭinivattetvā gaṇhanto paccāmasanto. Tadavattabbatāti tesaṁ saṅgāhakāsaṅgāhakasaṅgahitattāsaṅgahitattānaṁ
tika-abh05t1:56_2: avattabbatā. Asaṅgāhakattābhāvato eva…pe… na saṅgāhakattābhāvatoti yasmā nesaṁ asaṅgāhakattaṁ
tika-abh05t1:56_3: viya saṅgāhakattampi natthi, tato eva saṅgahitattāsaṅgahitattampīti dasseti.
tika-abh05t1:59_1: ekadesasabhāgatā samudāyasabhāgatā na hoti, tasmā. Tenāti rūpakkhandhena. Tānīti
tika-abh05t1:59_2: vedanādikkhandhattayanibbānāni. Yathā ca ekadesavisabhāgatāya na saṅgahitatā, evaṁ
tika-abh05t1:59_3: ekadesasabhāgatāya asaṅgahitatāpi natthīti dassento “na kevala”ntiādimāha. Saṅgahitāneva
tika-abh05t1:59_4: na na hontīti yojanā. Teti vedanādikkhandhattayanibbānasukhumarūpadhammā. Tehīti
tika-abh05t1:59_5: viññāṇakkhandhacakkhāyatanādīhi. Na kathañci sammissāti kenacipi pakārena na sammissāti
tika-abh05t1:59_6: asammissatāya saṅgahitattābhāvaṁ sādheti. Rūpakkhandhena viya…pe… na hotīti yathā
tika-abh05t1:59_7: rūpakkhandhena sabhāgatābhāvato nibbānaṁ na kenacipi saṅgahaṇena saṅgahitaṁ, evaṁ
tika-abh05t1:59_8: viññāṇakkhandhacakkhāyatanādīhi taṁ āyatanadhātusaṅgahehi saṅgahitaṁ na hotīti khandhasaṅgahābhāvo
tika-abh05t1:60_1: “rūpakkhandhena viññāṇakkhandhena cakkhāyatanena ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā,
tika-abh05t1:60_2: āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā”ti sakkā vattuṁ. Tena vuttaṁ “saṅgāhakattābhāvato
tika-abh05t1:60_3: evā”ti. Tathā “abyākatehi dhammehi ye dhammā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā, āyatanadhātusaṅgahena
tika-abh05t1:60_4: saṅgahitā”tiādi na sakkā vattuṁ tādisassa dhammassa abhāvatoti āha “sanibbāna…pe…
tika-abh05t1:60_5: bhāvatovā”ti. Aggahaṇaṁ veditabbanti yojanā. Tenāha “na hī”tiādi. Kañcīti kañci dhammajātaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:60_6: Teti abyākatadhammādayo. Attanoti abyākatadhammādiṁ sandhāyāha. Ekadesoti rūpakkhandhādi.
tika-abh05t1:61_0: Visabhāgakkhandhanibbānasamudāyattā khandhasaṅgahena dhammāyatanena na koci dhammo
tika-abh05t1:61_1: saṅgahito atthīti yojanā. Etassāti “dhammāyatanena saṅgahitā”ti etassa padassa dhammāyatanagaṇanena
tika-abh05t1:64_1: asaṅgahaṇapubbaṁ saṅgahaṇañca vuccamānaṁ saṅgahaṇāsaṅgahaṇānaṁ pavattivisesena vuttaṁ
tika-abh05t1:64_2: hotīti āha “saṅgahaṇā…pe… uddiṭṭhā”ti. Saṅgahābhāvakato asaṅgaho saṅgahahetuko saṅgahassa
tika-abh05t1:64_3: pavattivisesoyeva nāma hotīti āha “saṅgahaṇappavattivisesavirahe”ti. Kenaci samudayasaccādinā
tika-abh05t1:64_4: tīhipi saṅgahehi saṅgahitena saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannena dhammavisesena puna tatheva
tika-abh05t1:64_5: saṅgahito so eva samudayasaccādiko dhammaviseso saṅgahitena saṅgahito. Saṅgāhakattābhāvasabbhāvā
tika-abh05t1:64_6: saṅgāhakabhāvena na uddhaṭā, na asaṅgāhakattā eva. Yathā hi tīhi saṅgahehi na saṅgāhakā,
tika-abh05t1:64_7: evaṁ dvīhi, ekenapi saṅgahena na saṅgāhakā idha na uddhaṭā. Tehi saṅgahitāti tehi
tika-abh05t1:64_8: tīhi saṅgahehi saṅgahitā dhammā. Yassāti yassa attano saṅgāhakassa.
tika-abh05t1:65_0: Sakalavācakenāti anavasesaṁ khandhādiatthaṁ vadantena. Tena khandhādipadenāti “teneva
tika-abh05t1:65_1: saṅgahaṁ gaccheyyā”ti ettha tena khandhādipadenāti evaṁ yojetabbaṁ. Evaṁ pana ayojetvā
tika-abh05t1:65_2: “yaṁ attano saṅgāhakaṁ saṅgaṇhitvā puna teneva saṅgahaṁ gaccheyya, taṁ aññaṁ saṅgahitaṁ
tika-abh05t1:65_3: nāma natthī”ti evaṁ na sakkā vattuṁ. Kasmāti ce? Na hi yena samudayasaccādinā yaṁ
tika-abh05t1:65_4: saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannaṁ dhammajātaṁ khandhādisaṅgahehi saṅgahitaṁ, teneva samudayasaccādinā
tika-abh05t1:65_5: tassa tadavasiṭṭhassa saṅkhārakkhandhadhammassa, na ca tasseva kevalassa samudayasaccādikassa
tika-abh05t1:65_6: saṅgaho pucchito vissajjitoti yojanā, atha kho tena saṅkhārakkhandhadhammena phassādinā.
tika-abh05t1:65_7: Saṅgahitassāti saṅgahitatāvisiṭṭhassāti attho. Tasmā attano saṅgāhakaṁ sakalakkhaṇādiṁ
tika-abh05t1:65_8: saṅgaṇhitvā puna tena khandhādipadena yaṁ saṅgahaṁ gaccheyya, taṁ tādisaṁ natthīti
tika-abh05t1:65_9: attho veditabbo. Vedanā saddo ca khandho āyatanañcāti vedanā visuṁ khandho, saddo
tika-abh05t1:65_10: ca visuṁ āyatananti attho. Aññena khandhantarādinā. Asammissanti abyākatadukkhasaccādi
tika-abh05t1:65_11: viya amissitaṁ. Na hi…pe… etthāti saṅgahitatāvisiṭṭhena dhammena yo dhammo saṅgahito,
tika-abh05t1:65_12: tassa saṅgahitatāvisiṭṭhoyeva yo saṅgaho, so na ettha vāre pucchito vissajjito ca.
tika-abh05t1:65_13: Saṅgahovāti kevalo saṅgaho, na kattāpekkhoti attho. Na saṅgāhakenāti idaṁ yathāvuttena
tika-abh05t1:65_14: atthena nivattitassa dassanaṁ. Na hītiādi taṁsamatthanaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:68_1: pañcamanayo, tasmā yo ettha kenaci asaṅgahitena dhammavisesena puna asaṅgahito dhammaviseso
tika-abh05t1:68_2: asaṅgahitena asaṅgahito asaṅgahitatāya pucchitabbo vissajjitabbo ca. Tameva tāva
tika-abh05t1:68_3: yathāniddhāritaṁ dassento “rūpakkhandhena ye dhammā khandha…pe… asaṅgahitā, tehi
tika-abh05t1:68_4: dhammehi ye dhammā khandha…pe… asaṅgahitāti āhā”ti catutthanaye vuttanayānusārena.
tika-abh05t1:68_6: sasukhumarūpaṁ, tena sukhumarūpena saddhiṁ gahitaṁ viññāṇaṁ, tena sahitadhammasamudāyā
tika-abh05t1:68_7: sasukhuma…pe… dāyā. Ke pana teti āha “dukkhasaccā”tiādi. Kesañcīti nibbānacakkhāyatanādīnaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:68_8: Tīhipi saṅgahehi. Paripuṇṇasaṅgahehi tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgāhakā paripuṇṇasaṅgahāsaṅgāhakā.
tika-abh05t1:68_10: rūpakkhandhādayo. Tabbipariyāyenāti vuttavipariyāyena, tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahetabbassa
tika-abh05t1:69_0: Asaṅgāhakesu nibbānaṁ antogadhaṁ, tasmā taṁ anidassanaappaṭighehi asaṅgahetabbaṁ
tika-abh05t1:69_1: na hotīti attho. Tenāha “na ca tadeva tassa asaṅgāhaka”nti. “Vedanākkhandhena ye
tika-abh05t1:69_2: dhammā”tiādayo nava pañhā dutiyapañhādayo, te paṭhamapañhena saddhiṁ dasa, nāmarūpapañhādayo
tika-abh05t1:69_3: pana catuvīsatīti āha “sabbepi catuttiṁsa hontī”ti. Rūpakkhandhādivisesakapadanti
tika-abh05t1:69_5: ca pucchanatthanti attho. “Rūpakkhandhenā”tiādi sabbampi vā viññāpetuṁ icchitabhāvena
tika-abh05t1:69_6: vacanaṁ pañhabhāvato pucchā. Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṁ “pañhā panettha…pe… catuttiṁsa
tika-abh05t1:69_7: hontī”ti. Te hi lakkhaṇato dassitāti te niddhāritadhammā teneva asaṅgahitāsaṅgahitatāya
tika-abh05t1:70_0: Tadevāti eva-saddenāti “tadevā”ti ettha eva-saddena. “Yaṁ pucchāya uddhaṭaṁ padaṁ,
tika-abh05t1:70_1: taṁ khandhādīhi asaṅgahita”nti ettha “khandhādīhevā”ti avadhāraṇaṁ nippayojanaṁ pakārantarassa
tika-abh05t1:70_2: abhāvato. “Tīhi asaṅgaho”ti hi vuttaṁ. Tathā “asaṅgahitamevā”ti saṅgahitatānivattanassa
tika-abh05t1:70_3: anadhippetattā. Tadevāti pana icchitaṁ uddhaṭasseva asaṅgahitenaasaṅgahitabhāvassa
tika-abh05t1:70_4: avadhāretabbattāti dassento “na kadācī”tiādimāha. Tattha aññassāti anuddhaṭassa.
tika-abh05t1:70_5: Aniyatataṁ dassetīti idaṁ avadhāraṇaphaladassanaṁ. Niyamatoti sakkā vacanaseso yojetunti
tika-abh05t1:70_6: idampi eva-kārena siddhamevatthaṁ pākaṭataraṁ kātuṁ vuttaṁ. Yato hi eva-kāro, tato
tika-abh05t1:70_7: aññattha niyamoti. Evaṁpakāramevāti pucchāya uddhaṭappakārameva, yaṁ pakāraṁ pucchāya
tika-abh05t1:70_8: uddhaṭaṁ, taṁpakāramevāti attho. Tassāti asaṅgahitassa. Aññassāti pucchāya anuddhaṭappakārassa.
tika-abh05t1:70_9: Etena yo pucchāya uddhaṭo tīhipi saṅgahehi asaṅgahito, tasseva idha pucchitabbavissajjitabbabhāvo,
tika-abh05t1:70_10: na aññassāti dasseti. Tenāha “pucchāya uddhaṭañhī”tiādi. Āyatanadhātusaṅgahavasena
tika-abh05t1:70_11: cettha rūpakkhandhādīnaṁ aññasahitatā, viññāṇakkhandhādīnaṁ asahitatā ca veditabbā.
tika-abh05t1:71_0: Avasesā vedanādayo tayo khandhā nibbānañca sakalena rūpakkhandhena tesaṁ saṅgaho
tika-abh05t1:71_1: natthīti “saṅgahitā”ti na sakkā vattuṁ, ekadesena pana saṅgaho atthīti “asaṅgahitā
tika-abh05t1:71_2: na hontīti evaṁ daṭṭhabba”nti āha. “Rūpadhammāvā”ti niyamanaṁ pucchāya uddhaṭabhāvāpekkhanti
tika-abh05t1:71_3: dassento “pucchāya…pe… adhippāyo”ti āha. Tena vuttaṁ “anuddhaṭā vedanādayopi hi asaṅgahitā
tika-abh05t1:71_4: evā”ti. Etthāti etasmiṁ pañcamanayaniddese. Paṭhame nayeti paṭhame atthavikappe.
tika-abh05t1:71_5: Tathā dutiyeti etthāpi. Rūpaviññāṇehīti asukhumarūpadhammehi viññāṇena cāti ayamettha
tika-abh05t1:71_6: adhippāyoti dassento “oḷārika…pe… attho”ti āha. Kathaṁ pana rūpadhammāti vutte oḷārikarūpasseva
tika-abh05t1:71_7: gahaṇanti āha “rūpekadeso hi ettha rūpaggahaṇena gahito”ti.
tika-abh05t1:72_1: pucchitabbavissajjetabbabhāvena vuttampi kāmaṁ vedanādīheva catūhi asaṅgahitaṁ, taṁ
tika-abh05t1:72_2: pana na cakkhāyatanamevāti dassetuṁ “cakkhāyatanena panā”tiādi vuttaṁ. Yehi dhammehīti
tika-abh05t1:72_3: khandhādīsu yehi. Sabbaṁ dhammajātaṁ teva rūpādike dhamme udāneti pāḷiyaṁ. Kasmā
tika-abh05t1:72_4: panetaṁ udānetīti āha “sadisavissajjanā”tiādi. Paṭhamena udānena. Dveti “bāhirā upādā
tika-abh05t1:72_5: dve”ti ettha vuttaṁ dve-saddaṁ sandhāyāha. Tassa asaṅgahitassa. Yathādassitassāti
tika-abh05t1:75_1: bhājitaṁ, saṁvaṇṇetabbatāya ca padhānabhūtaṁ paccāmaṭṭhaṁ, na rūpakkhandhādipadanti
tika-abh05t1:75_2: dassento “yaṁ labbhati…pe… veditabba”nti vatvā puna “rūpakkhandhādīsu hī”tiādinā
tika-abh05t1:75_3: tamatthaṁ vivarati. Tattha na labbhatīti “sampayuttaṁ vippayutta”nti vā gahetuṁ na
tika-abh05t1:75_4: labbhati, alabbhamānampi pucchāya gahitaṁ paṭikkhepena vissajjetuṁ. Paṭikkhepopi
tika-abh05t1:75_5: hi pucchāya vissajjanameva. Tathā hi yamake “yassa rūpakkhandho nuppajjittha, tassa
tika-abh05t1:75_6: vedanākkhandho nuppajjitthā”ti pucchāya “natthī”ti vissajjitaṁ. Tena panettha rūpadhammesu
tika-abh05t1:75_7: sampayogaṭṭho na labbhatīti ayamattho dassito hoti. Alabbhamānampi sampayogapadaṁ
tika-abh05t1:75_8: gahitanti sambandho. Sabbatthāti rūpakkhandhavedanākkhandhādīsu. Etesanti rūpanibbānānaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:75_9: Visabhāgatāti ataṁsabhāgatā. Ekuppādādibhāvo hi sampayoge sabhāgatā, na saṅgahe viya
tika-abh05t1:75_10: samānasabhāgatā, tasmā ekuppādādibhāvarahitānaṁ rūpanibbānānaṁ sā ekuppādāditā visabhāgatā
tika-abh05t1:75_11: vuttā. Tadabhāvatoti tassā visabhāgatāya ekuppādāditāya abhāvato. Vippayogopi nivārito
tika-abh05t1:75_12: eva hoti, visabhāgo bhāvo vippayogoti vuttovāyamatthoti. “Catūsuhī”tiādinā vuttamevatthaṁ
tika-abh05t1:75_13: pākaṭataraṁ karoti. Tattha tesaṁ tehīti ca arūpakkhandhe eva parāmasati. Visabhāgatā
tika-abh05t1:75_14: ca hoti rūpanibbānesu avijjamānattāti attho. Tenāha “na ca rūpekadesassā”tiādi. Tenevāti
tika-abh05t1:76_0: Tīhi viññāṇadhātūhīti ghānajivhākāyaviññāṇadhātūhi vippayutte anārammaṇamissake rūpadhammamissake
tika-abh05t1:76_1: dhamme dīpeti rūpabhavoti yojanā. Pañcahīti cakkhuviññāṇādīhi pañcahi viññāṇadhātūhi.
tika-abh05t1:76_2: Ekāya manodhātuyā. Na sampayutteti na sampayutte eva. Tathā hi “vippayutte ahonte
tika-abh05t1:76_3: sattahipi sampayutte sattapi vā tā”ti vuttaṁ. Tenāti vippayuttatāpaṭikkhepena. Tāhīti
tika-abh05t1:76_4: sattaviññāṇadhātūhi. Sampayutte dīpentīti sampayutte dīpentiyeva, na sampayutte evāti
tika-abh05t1:76_5: evamavadhāraṇaṁ gahetabbaṁ. Esa nayo sesesupi. Sampayutte vedanādike. Sampayuttavippayuttabhāvehi
tika-abh05t1:76_6: navattabbaṁ, taṁyeva viññāṇadhātusattakaṁ. Sampayuttabhāvena navattabbāni sampayuttanavattabbāni,
tika-abh05t1:77_0: Yadi evanti yadi anārammaṇamissānaṁ dhammānaṁ vippayogo natthi. Anārammaṇamissobhayadhammāti
tika-abh05t1:77_2: eva, na arūpakkhandhamattena. Arūpakkhandheyeva pana sandhāya “tehi dhammehi ye dhammā
tika-abh05t1:77_3: vippayuttā”ti vuttanti nāyaṁ dosoti dasseti. Tadekadesāti “anārammaṇamissā”tiādinā
tika-abh05t1:77_4: vuttadhammasamudāyassa ekadesā. Tadekadesaññasamudāyāti tasseva yathāvuttassa samudāyassa
tika-abh05t1:77_5: ekadesā hutvā aññesaṁ avayavānaṁ rūpakkhandhādīnaṁ samudāyabhūtā. Vibhāgābhāvatoti
tika-abh05t1:77_6: bhedābhāvato. Bhedoti cettha accantabhedo adhippeto. Na hi samudāyāvayavānaṁ sāmaññavisesānaṁ
tika-abh05t1:77_7: viya accantabhedo atthi bhedābhedayuttattā. Tesaṁ accantabhedameva hi sandhāya “samudāyantogadhānaṁ
tika-abh05t1:77_8: ekadesānaṁ na vibhāgo atthī”ti saṅgahepi vuttaṁ. Tenāti avibhāgasabbhāvato sabhāgavisabhāgattābhāvena.
tika-abh05t1:77_9: Tesanti anārammaṇamissakasabbaviññāṇadhātuādīnaṁ. Te ca akusalābyākatā. Tesanti kusalākusalābyākatadhammānaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:77_10: Tasmāti yasmā vibhattasabhāvānaṁ na tesaṁ samudāyekadesādibhāvo, tasmā. Yasmā pana
tika-abh05t1:77_11: kusalādayo eva khandhādayoti khandhādiāmasanena samudāyekadesādibhāvo āpanno evāti
tika-abh05t1:77_12: vuttanayena vippayogābhāvo hoti, tasmā taṁ pariharanto “khandhādīni anāmasitvā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh05t1:77_13: Tesanti kusalādīnaṁ. Aññamaññavippayuttatā vuttā “kusalehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā”tiādinā.
tika-abh05t1:78_0: Chattiṁsāya piṭṭhidukapadesu vīsati dukapadāni imasmiṁ naye labbhanti, avasiṭṭhāni
tika-abh05t1:78_1: soḷasevāti āha “soḷasāti vattabba”nti. Tato eva “tevīsapadasata”nti ettha “tevīsa”nti
tika-abh05t1:78_2: idañca “ekavīsa”nti vattabbanti yojanā. Sabbatthāti sabbapañhesu. Ekakālekasantānānaṁ
tika-abh05t1:78_4: āha “kālasantāna…pe… dhātūna”nti. Ekadesasammissāti cittiddhipādādinā attano ekadeseneva
tika-abh05t1:78_5: khandhantarādīhi sammissā iddhipādādayo, anārammaṇehi rūpanibbānehi ca asammissā.
tika-abh05t1:78_8: vibhattā eva samudayasaccādayo sampayogīvippayogībhāvena, rūpakkhandhādayo vippayogībhāvena
tika-abh05t1:78_9: gahitāti yojanā. Tehi samudayasaccādīhi. Te saññākkhandhādayo. Kehici sahuppajjanārahehi
tika-abh05t1:78_10: ekadesantarehi vibhattehi. Na hi saṅkhārakkhandhādipariyāpannattepi samudayasaccādayo
tika-abh05t1:78_11: maggasaccādīhi sampayogaṁ labhanti. Tesanti vedanākkhandhasaññākkhandhādīnaṁ. Ekuppādā…pe…
tika-abh05t1:78_12: visabhāgatā cāti ekuppādāditāsaṅkhātā yathārahaṁ sabhāgatā visabhāgatā ca. Tena yathāvuttakāraṇena
tika-abh05t1:79_0: Bhinnakālānaṁ samudāyīnaṁ samudāyā bhinnakālasamudāyā. Vattamānā ca ekasmiṁ santāne
tika-abh05t1:79_1: ekekadhammā vattanti. Tasmāti yasmā etadeva, tasmā. Tesaṁ vedanākkhandhādīnaṁ vibhajitabbassa
tika-abh05t1:79_2: ekadesabhūtassa abhāvato. Sukhindriyādīni vedanākkhandhekadesabhūtānipi. Tena vibhāgākaraṇena.
tika-abh05t1:79_3: Yadi samānakālassa vibhajitabbassa abhāvato cakkhuviññāṇadhātādayo viññāṇakkhandhassa
tika-abh05t1:79_4: vibhāgaṁ na karonti, atha kasmā “cakkhuviññāṇadhātu…pe… manoviññāṇadhātu soḷasahi
tika-abh05t1:79_5: dhātūhi vippayuttā”ti vuttanti codanaṁ manasi katvā āha “khandhāyatana…pe… vippayuttāti
tika-abh05t1:79_6: vutta”nti. Evamevanti yathā dhātuvibhāgena vibhattassa viññāṇassa, evamevaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:80_0: 235.Taṁsampayogībhāvanti tehi khandhehi sampayogībhāvaṁ. Yathā hi samānakālasantānehi
tika-abh05t1:80_2: bhinnasantānehi bhinnakālehi ca tehi tassa vippayuttatāti āha “evaṁ taṁvippayogībhāvaṁ…pe…
tika-abh05t1:80_3: na vutta”nti. Visabhāgatānibandhassa vibhāgassa abhāvena avibhāgehi tehi tīhi khandhehi.
tika-abh05t1:80_4: Vibhāge hītiādinā tamevatthaṁ pākaṭataraṁ karoti. Vibhāgarahitehīti samānakālasantānehi
tika-abh05t1:80_5: ekacittuppādagatattā avibhattehi vedanākkhandhādīhi na yuttaṁ vippayuttanti vattuṁ.
tika-abh05t1:80_6: Tenāha “vijjamānehi…pe… bhāvato”ti. Tattha vijjamānassa samānassa samānajātikassāti
tika-abh05t1:80_7: adhippāyo. Na hi vijjamānaṁ rūpārūpaṁ aññamaññassa visabhāgaṁ na hoti. Anuppannā
tika-abh05t1:80_8: dhammā viyāti idaṁ visadisudāharaṇadassanaṁ. Yathā “anuppannā dhammā”ti anāgatakālaṁ
tika-abh05t1:80_9: vuccatīti āmaṭṭhakālabhedaṁ, evaṁ yaṁ āmaṭṭhakālabhedaṁ na hotīti attho. Uddharitabbaṁ
tika-abh05t1:80_10: desanāya desetabbanti vuttaṁ hoti. Vijjamānasseva vijjamānena sampayogo, sampayogārahasseva
tika-abh05t1:81_1: Avijjamānassa…pe… sampayogo natthīti etena pārisesato vijjamānassa ca vijjamānena
tika-abh05t1:81_2: sampayogo dassito. Avijjamānatādīpake bhede gahiteti yathāgahitesu dhammesu tehi
tika-abh05t1:81_3: vippayogīnaṁ avijjamānabhāvadīpake tesaṁyeva visese “arūpabhavo ekena khandhena dasahāyatanehi
tika-abh05t1:81_4: soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayutto”tiādinā gahite teneva ruppanādinā bhedena tesaṁ aññamaññaṁ
tika-abh05t1:81_5: visabhāgatāpi gahitā evāti vippayogo hotīti yojanā. Bhede pana aggahite tena tena
tika-abh05t1:81_6: gahaṇenāti yathāvutte avijjamānatādīpake visese, visabhāge vā aggahite “vedanā, saññā,
tika-abh05t1:81_7: saṅkhārakkhandho tīhi khandhehi ekenāyatanena sattahi dhātūhi sampayutto”tiādinā
tika-abh05t1:81_8: tena tena gahaṇena sabhāgatādīpanena visabhāgatāya aggahitattā sabhāgatāva hoti.
tika-abh05t1:81_9: Tathā ca sati sabhāgatte kā panettha sabhāgatāti āha “vijjamānatāya…pe… hotī”ti.
tika-abh05t1:81_10: Tassāti sabhāgatāya. Tasmāti visabhāgatāya alabbhamānattā, sabhāgatāya ca labbhamānattā.
tika-abh05t1:82_0: 262.Vitakko viyāti savitakkasavicāresu cittuppādesu vitakko viya. So hi vitakkarahitattā
tika-abh05t1:82_1: avitakko vicāramatto ca. Tenāha “koṭṭhāsantaracittuppādesu alīnā”ti. Tato eva so
tika-abh05t1:82_2: appadhāno, dutiyajhānadhammā evettha padhānāti āha “ye padhānā”ti. Tenevāti savitakkasavicāresu
tika-abh05t1:82_3: cittuppādesu vitakkassa avitakkavicāramattaggahaṇena idha aggahitattā, vitakkattike
tika-abh05t1:82_5: Samudayasaccena samānagatikā sadisappavattikā. Itīti iminā kāraṇena. Te avitakkavicāramattā
tika-abh05t1:82_6: dhammā na gahitā, samudayasaccaṁ viya na desanāruḷhā. Na savitakkasavicārehi samānagatikāti
tika-abh05t1:82_7: yojanā. Yadi hi te savitakkasavicārehi samānagatikā siyuṁ, “avitakkavicāramattehi
tika-abh05t1:82_8: dhammehi ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi dhammehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, te dhammā na kehici
tika-abh05t1:82_9: khandhehi, na kehici āyatanehi, ekāya dhātuyā vippayuttā”ti vattabbā siyuṁ. Yasmā
tika-abh05t1:82_10: pana te samudayasaccena samānagatikā. Yathā hi ye samudayasaccena sampayuttehi vippayuttā,
tika-abh05t1:82_11: tesaṁ kehici vippayogaṁ vattuṁ na sakkā, evaṁ tehipi. Tathā hi vakkhati “samudayasaccādīnī”tiādi.
tika-abh05t1:82_12: Dasamo…pe… vuttoti ettha dasamanaye tehi avitakkavicāramattehi vippayuttehi vippayuttānaṁ
tika-abh05t1:82_13: soḷasahi dhātūhi vippayogo vutto, osānanaye tehi vippayuttānaṁ aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi
tika-abh05t1:82_14: saṅgaho ca vuttoti tasmā na te savitakkasavicārehi samānagatikāti dasseti.
tika-abh05t1:83_0: Vitakkasahitesūti sahavitakkesu. Tesūti avitakkavicāramattesu saha vitakkena dutiyajjhānadhammesu,
tika-abh05t1:83_1: “avitakkavicāramattā”ti gahitesu vuttesūti attho. Sabbepi teti dutiyajjhānadhammā
tika-abh05t1:83_2: vitakko cāti sabbepi te dhammā sakkā vattuṁ. Tathā hi sampayogavippayogapadaniddese
tika-abh05t1:83_3: “avitakkavicāramattā dhammā ekena khandhena ekenāyatanena ekāya dhātuyā kehici sampayuttā”ti
tika-abh05t1:83_4: vuttaṁ. Tattha ekena khandhenāti saṅkhārakkhandhena. So hi samudāyoti “avitakkavicāramattā
tika-abh05t1:83_5: dhammā”ti vuttadhammasamudāyo. Nanu vitakkopettha dhammasaṅgahaṁ gato, so ca vicārato
tika-abh05t1:83_6: aññenapi sampayuttoti codanaṁ sandhāyāha “na hi tadekadesassa…pe… hotī”ti. Yathātiādinā
tika-abh05t1:83_7: tamevatthaṁ iddhipādanidassanena vibhāveti. Tassattho – yathā iddhipādasamudāyassa
tika-abh05t1:83_8: ekadesabhūtānaṁ chandiddhipādādīnaṁ tīhi khandhehi sampayogo vutto, taṁsamudāyassa
tika-abh05t1:83_9: na hoti, evaṁ idhāpi vitakkassa aññehi sampayogo avitakkavicāramattassa samudāyassa na hotīti.
tika-abh05t1:84_0: Yadi evaṁ “iddhipādo dvīhi khandhehi sampayutto”tiādi na vattabbanti ce? No na vattabbanti
tika-abh05t1:84_1: dassento “yathā panā”tiādimāha. Tattha tesūti iddhipādesu. Samudāyassāti iddhipādasamudāyassa.
tika-abh05t1:84_2: Tehi vedanākkhandhādīhi sampayuttatā vuttā “iddhipādo dvīhi khandhehi sampayutto”tiādinā.
tika-abh05t1:84_3: Tenāti vicārena. Na hītiādinā yathādhigatadhammānaṁ sampayuttatāya navattabbābhāvaṁ
tika-abh05t1:84_4: udāharaṇadassanavasena vibhāveti. Keci vicikicchā taṁsahagatā ca mohavajjā mohena
tika-abh05t1:84_5: sampayuttā, keci asampayuttā. Mohenāti vicikicchāsahagatamohameva sandhāya vadati.
tika-abh05t1:84_6: Iti iminā kāraṇena na samudāyo tena mohena sampayutto. Añño koci dhammo hetubhāvo
tika-abh05t1:84_7: nāpi atthi, yena hetunā so dassanenapahātabbahetukoti vutto samudāyo. Evanti iminā
tika-abh05t1:84_8: nayena “bhāvanā…pe… yopi sampayuttā”ti navattabbatāya nidassetabbāti attho. Evanti
tika-abh05t1:84_9: yathā dassanenapahātabbahetukasamudāyassa sampayuttatā na vattabbā, evaṁ yena dhammena
tika-abh05t1:84_10: avitakka…pe… siyā, taṁ na natthi. Tasmāti yasmā avitakkavicāramattesu kocipi vicārena
tika-abh05t1:84_11: asampayutto natthi, tasmā. Teti avitakkavicāramattā dhammā. Ekadhammepi…pe… kato
tika-abh05t1:87_1: ca vippayutte rūpanibbānādike tadaññadhamme satipi vippayogābhāvato. Saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṁ
tika-abh05t1:87_2: vitthārena dassetuṁ “na hī”tiādi vuttaṁ. Tato lobhasahagatacittuppādato aññadhammānaṁ
tika-abh05t1:87_3: avasiṭṭhānaṁ kusalākusalābyākatadhammānaṁ khandhādīsu kenaci vippayogo na hi atthi
tika-abh05t1:87_4: khandhapañcakādīnaṁ saṅgaṇhanato tesaṁ. Te eva cittuppādāti te lobhasahagatacittuppādā
tika-abh05t1:87_5: eva. Tadaññadhammānanti tadaññadhammānampīti pi-saddalopo daṭṭhabbo. Tathāti iminā
tika-abh05t1:87_6: na ca te eva dhammā aḍḍhadutiyāyatanadhātuyo, atha kho te ca tato aññe cāti imamatthaṁ upasaṁharati.
tika-abh05t1:88_0: Nanu tadaññabhāvato eva tehi itaresaṁ vippayogo siddhoti āha “na cā”tiādi. Tadaññasamudāyehīti
tika-abh05t1:88_1: tato lobhasahagatacittuppādato aññasamudāyehi aññe lobhasahagatā dhammā vippayuttā
tika-abh05t1:88_2: na honti. Kasmā? Samudāye…pe… vippayogābhāvato. Tassattho – samudāyena lobhasahagatatadaññadhammarāsinā
tika-abh05t1:88_3: ekadesānaṁ lobhasahagatadhammānaṁ vippayogābhāvato, tathā ye ekadesā hutvā aññesaṁ
tika-abh05t1:88_4: avayavānaṁ samudāyabhūtā, tesañca samudāyena vippayogābhāvatoti. Anena samudāyena
tika-abh05t1:88_5: avayavassa samudāyassa avayavena ca tassa na vippayogo, avayavasseva pana avayavenāti
tika-abh05t1:88_6: dasseti. Esa nayoti yvāyaṁ samudayasacce vutto vidhi, eseva maggasaccasukhindriyādīsu
tika-abh05t1:88_7: arūpakkhandhekadesattā tesanti dasseti. Niravasesesūti abahikatavitakkesu. Vitakko
tika-abh05t1:88_8: hi samudāyato abahikato. “So hi samudāyo”tiādiko vuttanayo labbhatīti āha “aggahaṇe
tika-abh05t1:89_0: Aññesupi samudayasaccādīsu vissajjanassa…pe… daṭṭhabbaṁ, yato samudayasaccādi idha
tika-abh05t1:89_1: na gahitanti adhippāyo. Sampayuttādhikārato “aññenā”ti padaṁ sampayuttato aññaṁ vadatīti
tika-abh05t1:89_2: āha “asampayuttena asammissanti attho”ti. Idāni byatirekenapi tamatthaṁ patiṭṭhāpetuṁ
tika-abh05t1:89_4: vuttalakkhaṇena. Cittanti “cittehi dhammehi ye dhammā”ti pañhaṁ upalakkheti. Sahayuttapadehi
tika-abh05t1:89_5: sattāti “cetasikehi dhammehi ye dhammā”tiādinā cittena sahayutte dhamme dīpentehi
tika-abh05t1:89_6: padehi āgatā satta pañhā. Tiṇṇaṁ tikapadānamaggahaṇena ūnoti katvā. Ye sandhāya “tike
tika-abh05t1:89_7: tayo”ti vuttaṁ. Taṁ pana vedanāpītittikesu pacchimaṁ, vitakkattike paṭhamanti padattayaṁ veditabbaṁ.
tika-abh05t1:90_0: 309. Uddhaṭapadena pakāsiyamānā atthā abhedopacārena “uddhaṭapada”nti vuttāti āha
tika-abh05t1:90_1: “uddhaṭapadena sampayuttehī”ti. Tena ca yathāvuttena uddhaṭapadena. Manena yuttāti
tika-abh05t1:90_2: ettha mananamattattā manodhātu “mano”ti vuttāti āha “manodhātuyā ekantasampayuttā”ti.
tika-abh05t1:93_0: 317. Rūpakkhandhena vippayuttā nāma cattāro arūpino khandhā, tesaṁ aññehi sampayogo
tika-abh05t1:93_1: nāma natthi tādisassa aññassa sampayogino abhāvato. Samudāyassa ca ekadesena sampayogo
tika-abh05t1:93_2: natthīti vuttovāyamattho. Vedanākkhandhādīhi vippayuttaṁ rūpaṁ nibbānañca, tassa
tika-abh05t1:93_3: kenaci sampayogo natthevāti āha “rūpakkhandhādīhi…pe… natthī”ti. Tenāti “rūpakkhandhena
tika-abh05t1:96_0: 319. “Samāsapadaṁ ida”nti vatvā ayaṁ nāma samāsoti dassento “yassa khandhādino”tiādimāha,
tika-abh05t1:96_1: yassa vedanākkhandhādinoti attho. Yaṁ idha sampayuttaṁ vuttanti imasmiṁ navamanaye
tika-abh05t1:96_2: yaṁ dhammajātaṁ sampayuttanti vuttaṁ. Rūpakkhandhādīsu araṇantesu abbhantarabāhiramātikādhammesūti
tika-abh05t1:96_3: niddhāraṇe bhummaṁ. Tañhi dhammajātaṁ attanā sampayuttena vedanākkhandhādinā sayaṁ
tika-abh05t1:96_4: sampayuttanti niddhāritaṁ. Ayogoti asampayogo. Vakkhati dasamanaye. Tattha hi “rūpakkhandhena
tika-abh05t1:96_5: vedanādayo vippayuttā, tehi rūpakkhandho vippayutto”ti vatvā nibbānaṁ kathanti codanaṁ
tika-abh05t1:96_7: ekāya dhātuyā kehici vippayutta”nti ettha hi yathā sukhumarūpaṁ viya sarūpato anuddhaṭampi
tika-abh05t1:96_8: nibbānaṁ kehicītipadena gahitameva hotīti edisesu ṭhānesu nibbānaṁ sukhumarūpagatikanti
tika-abh05t1:96_9: viññāyati, evamidhāpi “rūpamissakehi vā”ti etena anupādinnaanupādāniyādīhi nibbānamissakehipi
tika-abh05t1:96_10: asampayogo vutto hotīti daṭṭhabbo. Avikalacatukkhandhasaṅgāhakehi padehi sahavattino
tika-abh05t1:96_11: aññassa sampayogino abhāvato atītānāgatehi ca sampayogo natthevāti tassa ayujjamānataṁ
tika-abh05t1:96_12: dassento “vattamānānameva…pe… arūpabhavādīhīti attho”ti āha. Itareti ye sampayogaṁ
tika-abh05t1:96_13: labhanti, ke pana te rūpena asammissā arūpekadesabhūtā. Tenāha “vedanākkhandhādayo”ti.
tika-abh05t1:99_0: 353. Ye vippayuttena vippayuttabhāvena pāḷiyaṁ aggahitā, tesu keci vippayuttassa
tika-abh05t1:99_1: dhammantarassa abhāvato keci khandhādīhi vippayogasseva asambhavatoti imamatthaṁ
tika-abh05t1:99_3: iminā bhinnakālatādivisesavato arūpakkhandhassa vippayuttassa dhammantarassa abhāvamāha,
tika-abh05t1:99_4: anārammaṇamissakabhāvatoti iminā pana sabbassapi. Kāmabhavo upapattibhavo saññībhavo
tika-abh05t1:99_5: pañcavokārabhavoti ime cattāro mahābhavā. Vippayogābhāvatoti vippayogāsambhavato.
tika-abh05t1:99_6: Na hi ye dukkhasaccādīhi vippayuttā, tehi vippayuttānaṁ tesaṁyeva dukkhasaccādīnaṁ
tika-abh05t1:102_1: “Etena saha sambandho”ti iminā padānaṁ sambandhadassanamukhena “samudayasaccena ye
tika-abh05t1:102_2: dhammā sampayuttā”ti pāḷiyā atthavivaraṇaṁ pākaṭataraṁ katvā kehicītipadassatthaṁ
tika-abh05t1:102_3: kātuṁ “kehicīti etassa panā”tiādimāha. Atthaṁ dassetuṁ āhāti sambandho. Visesetvāti
tika-abh05t1:102_5: visesanaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ, yato te samudayasaccena khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahitāti vuttā.
tika-abh05t1:102_6: Sayaṁ attanā sampayutto na hotīti vuttaṁ “attavajjehī”ti. Tena vuttaṁ “cittaṁ na
tika-abh05t1:102_7: vattabbaṁ cittena sampayuttantipi, cittena vippayuttantipī”ti. Sampayogārahehīti
tika-abh05t1:102_8: visesanaṁ sukhumarūpaṁ nibbānanti dve sandhāya kataṁ, na taṇhādike.
tika-abh05t1:105_0: 417. Navamanaye sampayogavisiṭṭhā sampayuttā uddhaṭā, dvādasamanaye ca sampayogavisiṭṭhā
tika-abh05t1:105_1: saṅgahitāsaṅgahitāti ubhayatthāpi sampayogavisiṭṭhāva gahitāti āha “dvādasama…pe… labbhantī”ti.
tika-abh05t1:108_1: arūpabhavādīhi. Oḷārikāyatanāneva honti āyatanadhātusaṅgahehipi asaṅgahitattā. Teti
tika-abh05t1:108_3: asaṅgāhakatte tehi asaṅgahitānaṁ sampayogo na sambhavatīti vedanākkhandhādayo idha
tika-abh05t1:108_4: terasamanaye vissajjanaṁ na ruhanti nārohanti. Tenāha aṭṭhakathāyaṁ “vedanākkhandhena
tika-abh05t1:108_5: hi khandhādivasena rūpārūpadhammā asaṅgahitā honti, tesañca sampayogo nāma natthī”ti
tika-abh05t1:109_0: Teti “dukkhasaccādī”ti ādi-saddena vuttadhammā. Asabba…pe… siyuṁ avitakkāvicārādidhammā
tika-abh05t1:109_1: viya. Na tesaṁ vippayogo natthi tabbinimuttassa cittuppādassa sambhavato. Vedanākkhandhena
tika-abh05t1:109_2: asaṅgahitānaṁ anārammaṇamissakattā na “vippayogassa atthitāyā”ti vuttaṁ. Tathā cāha
tika-abh05t1:113_1: Tenāha “pariyosāne naye”ti. Vissajjetabbadhammavivittā pucchā moghapucchā, sā tathābhūtāpi
tika-abh05t1:113_2: vissajjetabbadhammābhāvassa ñāpikā hotīti āha “tesaṁ pucchāya moghattā te na labbhantī”ti.
tika-abh05t1:113_3: Moghā pucchā etassāti moghapucchako. Aṭṭhamo nayo tattha sabbapucchānaṁ moghattā.
tika-abh05t1:113_4: Tena ca sahāti tena aṭṭhamanayena saddhiṁ imasmiṁ osānanaye aṭṭhamanaye ca osānanaye
tika-abh05t1:113_5: ca ete dhammāyatanādayo sabbappakārena na labbhanti. Vippayogassapi abhāvāti tattha kāraṇamāha.
